<ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- llvm/ADT/SuffixTree.h - Tree for substrings --------------&#42;- C++ -&#42;-===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A data structure for fast substring queries.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Suffix trees represent the suffixes of their input strings in their leaves.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A suffix tree is a type of compressed trie structure where each node</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// represents an entire substring rather than a single character. Each leaf</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the tree is a suffix.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A suffix tree can be seen as a type of state machine where each state is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// substring of the full string. The tree is structured so that, for a string</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of length N, there are exactly N leaves in the tree. This structure allows</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// us to quickly find repeated substrings of the input string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this implementation, a &quot;string&quot; is a vector of unsigned integers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These integers may result from hashing some data type. A suffix tree can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contain 1 or many strings, which can then be queried as one large string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The suffix tree is implemented using Ukkonen&#39;s algorithm for linear-time</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// suffix tree construction. Ukkonen&#39;s algorithm is explained in more detail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the paper by Esko Ukkonen &quot;On-line construction of suffix trees. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// paper is available at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// https://www.cs.helsinki.fi/u/ukkonen/SuffixT1withFigs.pdf</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;SUPPORT&#95;SUFFIXTREE&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;SUPPORT&#95;SUFFIXTREE&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/arrayref-h">llvm/ADT/ArrayRef.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/allocator-h">llvm/Support/Allocator.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Construct the suffix tree for the prefix of the input ending at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p EndIdx.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Used to construct the full suffix tree iteratively. At the end of each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// step, the constructed suffix tree is either a valid suffix tree, or a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// suffix tree with implicit suffixes. At the end of the final step, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// suffix tree is a valid tree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param EndIdx The end index of the current prefix in the main string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param SuffixesToAdd The number of suffixes that must be added</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to complete the suffix tree at the current phase.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns The number of suffixes that have not been added at the end of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// this step.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> extend(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EndIdx, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SuffixesToAdd);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This vector contains all leaf nodes of this suffix tree. These leaf nodes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// are identified using post-order depth-first traversal, so that the order</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// of these leaf nodes in the vector matches the order of the leaves in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// tree from left to right if one were to draw the tree on paper.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;SuffixTreeLeafNode &#42;&gt; LeafNodes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Perform a post-order depth-first traversal of the tree and perform two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// tasks during the traversal. The first is to populate LeafNodes, adding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// nodes in order of the traversal. The second is to keep track of the leaf</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// descendants of every internal node by assigning values to LeftLeafIndex</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// and RightLefIndex fields of SuffixTreeNode for all internal nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> setLeafNodes();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Construct a suffix tree from a sequence of unsigned integers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Str The string to construct the suffix tree for.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param OutlinerLeafDescendants Whether to consider leaf descendants or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// only leaf children (used by Machine Outliner).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suffixtree/#a27fe0d1c22c4e49e3909514161e7b481">SuffixTree</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suffixtree/#aa49bfcd763abc20e39f1f6ea9bffc0fb">Str</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machineoutliner-cpp/#ab04e0eb540a588f835f9088d621f1382">OutlinerLeafDescendants</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Iterator for finding all repeated substrings in the suffix tree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator/#a319c7993fd896765eb279c347dd2dc54">RepeatedSubstringIterator</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The current node we&#39;re visiting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode">SuffixTreeNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The repeated substring associated with this node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstring">RepeatedSubstring</a> RS;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The nodes left to visit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;SuffixTreeInternalNode &#42;&gt;</a> InternalNodesToVisit;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The minimum length of a repeated substring to find.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Since we&#39;re outlining, we want at least two instructions in the range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// FIXME: This may not be true for targets like X86 which support many</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// instruction lengths.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MinLength = 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Vector of leaf nodes of the suffix tree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::vector&lt;SuffixTreeLeafNode &#42;&gt; &amp;LeafNodes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Whether to consider leaf descendants or only leaf children.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OutlinerLeafDescendants = !LeafNodes.empty();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Move the iterator to the next repeated substring.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> advance();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Return the current repeated substring.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator/#a6832b25cc044e093b4e40c23457643bf"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstring">RepeatedSubstring</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator/#a6832b25cc044e093b4e40c23457643bf">operator&#42;</a>() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RS; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator/#afa6633893f4ee73d31c894c3b7c6dc0d"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator/#a319c7993fd896765eb279c347dd2dc54">RepeatedSubstringIterator</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator/#afa6633893f4ee73d31c894c3b7c6dc0d">operator++</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">      advance();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator/#a2fa63fa45f1ef594e239afbcc678936a"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator/#a319c7993fd896765eb279c347dd2dc54">RepeatedSubstringIterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator/#a2fa63fa45f1ef594e239afbcc678936a">operator++</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator/#a319c7993fd896765eb279c347dd2dc54">RepeatedSubstringIterator</a> It(&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">      advance();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator/#a6bee815e9ceb96c9e3ea1ffe5f309973"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator/#a6bee815e9ceb96c9e3ea1ffe5f309973">operator==</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator/#a319c7993fd896765eb279c347dd2dc54">RepeatedSubstringIterator</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator/#a503534c99f418d7583115d60fa592736"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator/#a503534c99f418d7583115d60fa592736">operator!=</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator/#a319c7993fd896765eb279c347dd2dc54">RepeatedSubstringIterator</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !(&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator/#a319c7993fd896765eb279c347dd2dc54"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator/#a319c7993fd896765eb279c347dd2dc54">RepeatedSubstringIterator</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode">SuffixTreeInternalNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::vector&lt;SuffixTreeLeafNode &#42;&gt; &amp;LeafNodes = &#123;&#125;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">        : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>), LeafNodes(LeafNodes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do we have a non-null node?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Yes. At the first step, we need to visit all of N&#39;s children.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: This means that we visit N last.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InternalNodesToVisit.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">      advance();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suffixtree/#aabca947847ba6f5cc1361be91ba9717c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typedef</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtree/repeatedsubstringiterator">RepeatedSubstringIterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suffixtree/#aabca947847ba6f5cc1361be91ba9717c">iterator</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suffixtree/#a53f2e900a260f932d4f3d87c93c55eaa"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suffixtree/#aabca947847ba6f5cc1361be91ba9717c">iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suffixtree/#a53f2e900a260f932d4f3d87c93c55eaa">begin</a>() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suffixtree/#aabca947847ba6f5cc1361be91ba9717c">iterator</a>(Root, LeafNodes); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suffixtree/#a94ad78b0bfc461f317f6824aca96e486"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suffixtree/#aabca947847ba6f5cc1361be91ba9717c">iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suffixtree/#a94ad78b0bfc461f317f6824aca96e486">end</a>() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suffixtree/#aabca947847ba6f5cc1361be91ba9717c">iterator</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
